name: roar-of-time
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
short_effect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.x_y: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user blasts the target with power that distorts even time. The user can’t move on the next turn.
